tossup_question: 19) EARTH AND SPACE  Which of the following best describes the luster of quartz:
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) dull 
X) silky 
Y) metallic 
Z) vitreous
bonus_question: 19) EARTH AND SPACE  Which of the following is LEAST accurate regarding earthquakes:
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) scientists agree that mega-quakes of magnitude 10 are very likely in the near future 
X) the world’s greatest earthquake zone is the circum-Pacific seismic belt 
Y) Alaska has the greatest number of earthquakes in the U.S. 
Z) deep earthquakes are much less likely to be followed by aftershocks than shallow earthquakes
bonus_answer: ANSWER: W) SCIENTISTS AGREE THAT MEGA-QUAKES OF MAGNITUDE 10 ARE LIKELY IN THE NEAR FUTURE
